Apple revealed macOS 26 Tahoe a couple months ago and it’ll likely be released publicly by the end of September. So let's take a look at all the new features you can expect to see. Starting with a new Liquid Glass interface that adds a new refraction effect to icons, widgets, and sidebars.
title: macOS 26 Tahoe: Everything New
